name: The Fog
description: Open your way across a dark open world and fight against what lives within the fog and beyond. The Fog is a survival horror game inspired on the 1980 novella "The Mist" by Stephen King.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bits Processor: Intel I5 2500k Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750ti DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64-Bits Processor: Intel I5 7500 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
